name: chinese mobile01 tw.yahoo
description: based on "Clearer Chinese Sites - w/ MS JhengHei/YaHei Fonts"
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* Written by Danny Siu <danny.siu at gmail dot com> */

/* http://dsiu.org/ */



/* Traditional Chinese Sites */

@-moz-document 

domain("hk"),

domain("tw"),

domain("discuss.com.hk"),

domain("facekoo.com"),

domain("google.com.hk"),

domain("google.com.tw"),

domain("ithome.com.tw"),

domain("on.cc"),

domain("mobile01.com"),

domain("uwants.com"),

domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),

domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),

domain("hk.yahoo.com"),

domain("tw.yahoo.com"),

domain("tw.news.yahoo.com"),

domain("udn.com")

{

* { font-family: "Microsoft JhengHei",sans-serif !important; }
* { font-size: 16px !important; }
body, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p{ font-family: "Microsoft JhengHei",sans-serif !important; }
body, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p { font-size: 16px !important; }
.sf-menu a { padding: 9px 3px !important; }
#m01group li {margin-right:0px !important;}
}



/* Simplified Chinese Sites */

@-moz-document 

domain("cn"),

domain("265.com"),

domain("163.com"),

domain("21cn.com"),

domain("91.com"),

domain("92wy.com"),

domain("baidu.com"),

domain("blogbus.com"),

domain("chinahr.com"),

domain("chinaren.com"),

domain("cnbeta.com"),

domain("cngba.com"),

domain("csdn.com"),

domain("csdn.net"),

domain("douban.com"),

domain("fanfou.com"),

domain("google.cn"),

domain("infoq.com"),

domain("infzm.com"),

domain("it168.com"),

domain("itpub.net"),

domain("kaixin.com"),

domain("kaixin001.com"),

domain("mop.com"),

domain("netease.com"),

domain("oschina.net"),

domain("people.com.cn"),

domain("qq.com"),

domain("renren.com"),

domain("sina.com"),

domain("sina.com.cn"),

domain("sohu.com"),

domain("sogou.com"),

domain("taobao.com"),

domain("tgbus.com"),

domain("tianya.cn"),

domain("tianya.com"),

domain("tom.com"),

domain("cn.yahoo.com"),

domain("youku.com"),

domain("xiaonei.com"),

domain("ycool.com"),

domain("zaobao.com"),

domain("zol.com.cn")

{

* { font-family: "Microsoft Yahei",sans-serif !important; }

}
